description: Retrieves recent per-symbol market documents from Mongo within a time window to support sequence detection and analytics pipelines.
disclaimer: This VirtualGlass extension is not associated with, endorsed by, or approved by Symbol Monitor Sequence. It may use Symbol Monitor Sequence APIs for convenience and is provided free to use. BrainBoost Ltd. is not responsible for any damages, losses, or issues resulting from its use.

sections.title: Symbol Monitor Sequence
sections.text: Retrieves recent per-symbol market documents from Mongo within a time window to support sequence detection and analytics pipelines.
list: Output: Emits structured items/events for downstream subscribers.

sections.title: Typical workflow
sections.intro: Configure Symbol Monitor Sequence with the connection fields and run it as part of a BrainBoost pipeline.

cards.title: Connect
cards.text: Provide connection_name in the connection form.

cards.title: Fetch
cards.text: Run `fetch()` to ingest, transform, or stream data.

cards.title: Consume
cards.text: Use the emitted items in downstream indexing, search, or automation steps.

items.q: What do I need to configure?
items.a: At minimum: connection_name. Additional fields may be optional depending on your use case.
Emits structured items/events for downstream subscribers.
Outputs are emitted to downstream subscribers in the BrainBoost pipeline. Some datasources also write artifacts (context files, catalogs, or exports) locally based on your configuration.

sections.title: Ready to use Symbol Monitor Sequence?
sections.text: Add it to your BrainBoost pipeline and start ingesting.
sections.subtext: Run this datasource locally with your own credentials and storage.
